Title: Bates Motel
Actors: Vera Farmiga, Freddie Highmore, Max Thieriot, Olivia Cooke
Plot: A modern re-imagining and prequel to the movie Psycho (1960). This story begins with the earlier years of a teenage Norman Bates and his mother Norma who live in an old house overlooking ...
Awards: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 7 nominations.
